data.name: pattern_AddRelationshipEvent
data.value:
h1. "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}"有一个新活动
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" 为 "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}" 添加了一个活动.
$AdditionalData.get_item("EventContent")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item("Files").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
登录地址: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"更改订阅设置":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_CreateNewContact
data.value:
h1. CRM. 使用“网站联络表单”创建的新联系人"$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Default.aspx?ID=$EntityID"
$__DateTime 一位使用“网站联络表单”的联系人已创建 "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Default.aspx?ID=$EntityID"
联系信息：
#foreach($contactInfo in $AdditionalData.Keys) #each
$contactInfo: $AdditionalData.get_item($contactInfo)
#end
^您收到此电邮，因为您是"${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"门户的注册用户。您可以在"订阅设置":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"下修改您的通知类型。.^

data.name: pattern_ExportCompleted
data.value:
h1. CRM. 数据已成功导出
请点击此链接下载压缩包文件: "exportdata.zip":"${EntityRelativeURL}". *注意*：此链接有效期为24小时。
登录地址: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath" "更改订阅设置":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"
不管您在系统操作中遇到任何疑难，请随时联系我们："support.onlyoffice.com":"http://support.onlyoffice.com"
ONLYOFFICE™团队 敬上 "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_ImportCompleted
data.value: CRM. 已成功导入联系人

data.name: pattern_ResponsibleForOpportunity
data.value:
h1.您被任命为机会负责人： "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Deals.aspx?id=$EntityID"
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" 已任命您负责机会：$EntityTitle .
#if($AdditionalData.get_item("OpportunityDescription")&&$AdditionalData.get_item("OpportunityDescription")!="")
机会简介： $AdditionalData.get_item("OpportunityDescription") #end
^您收到此电邮，因为您是"${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"门户的注册用户。若想修改通知类型，请在"订阅设置"下管理。:"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_ResponsibleForTask
data.value:
h1.Task Assigned to You: $EntityTitle
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has appointed you responsible for the task: $EntityTitle. #if($AdditionalData.get_item("TaskCategory"))
Task category: $AdditionalData.get_item("TaskCategory") #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("ContactRelativeUrl"))
Link with contact: "$AdditionalData.get_item("ContactTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("ContactRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("CaseRelativeUrl"))
Link with case: "$AdditionalData.get_item("CaseTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("CaseRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("DealRelativeUrl"))
Link with opportunity: "$AdditionalData.get_item("DealTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("DealRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription")&&$AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription")!="")
Task description: $AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription") #end
Due date: $AdditionalData.get_item("DueDate")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item("Files").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
Go to the "Tasks":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Tasks.aspx" list.
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.name: pattern_SetAccess
data.value:
h1. 您已获得访问 "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}" 的权限
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" 允许您访问 "$EntityTitle":"${__VirtualRootPath}/${EntityRelativeURL}".
登录地址: "$__VirtualRootPath":"$__VirtualRootPath"
"更改订阅设置":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL"

data.name: pattern_TaskReminder
data.value:
h1. 任务提醒： $EntityTitle #if($AdditionalData.get_item("TaskCategory"))
任务类别： $AdditionalData.get_item("TaskCategory") #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("ContactRelativeUrl"))
联系人链接： "$AdditionalData.get_item("ContactTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("ContactRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("CaseRelativeUrl"))
案例链接："$AdditionalData.get_item("CaseTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("CaseRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("DealRelativeUrl"))
机会链接： "$AdditionalData.get_item("DealTitle")":"${__VirtualRootPath}/$AdditionalData.get_item("DealRelativeUrl")" #end #if($AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription")&&$AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription")!="")
任务简介： $AdditionalData.get_item("TaskDescription") #end
到期日期： $AdditionalData.get_item("DueDate")
前往"任务":"${__VirtualRootPath}/Products/CRM/Tasks.aspx" list.
^您收到此电邮，因为您是"${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}"门户的注册用户。^

data.name: subject_AddRelationshipEvent
data.value: CRM. 已为 $EntityTitle 添加新活动

data.value: CRM。使用“网站联系表”创建的新联系人

data.value: CRM. 已成功导入联系人

data.name: subject_ResponsibleForOpportunity
data.value: CRM。您被任命为机会的负责人：$EntityTitle

data.name: subject_ResponsibleForTask
data.value: CRM. 您有新的待办事项: $EntityTitle
